EmailTemplate.subject: Get the latest ATM technology, fast
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consumers are still demanding easy and fast access to their cash. And the self-service channel is the easiest way to provide 24/7 instant access.
As more transactions migrate to the self-service channel, the ATM is vital in meeting customers’ needs.
So, we’re pleased to introduce to you NCR SelfServ™ Preferred Offers – where you can select from a range of pre-configured units and go from order to shipment in as little as 10 business days*.
Using NCR SelfServ Preferred Offers program means you can bring standout self-service experiences to your customers fast. We have worked closely with our regional teams to ensure that our SelfServ™ Preferred Offer configurations meet your business needs, and in some cases you’ll be receiving more functionality than before!
*Where stock is available. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
